slide.title: Closures
slide.blurb: $this from current scope supported in Closures
slide.example:
<?php
class Foo {
  private $prop = "bar";
  public function getPrinter() {
    return function() { echo ucfirst($this->prop); };
  }
}

$a = new Foo;
$func = $a->getPrinter();
$func(); // Outputs: Bar
?>
